<<<<<<< HEAD
The rise, spring and foundation of the Anabaptists, or re-baptized of our time vvritten in French by Guy de Brez, 1565 ... ; and translated for the use of his countrymen, by J.S. Racine, source et fondement des anabaptistes ou rebaptisez de nostre temps. Book 1. English Brès, Guy de, 1522-1567. Scottow, Joshua, 1618-1698.
[5], 58 p.
Printed, and to be sold by Marmaduke Johnson, Cambridge [Mass.] : 1668.
Advertisement: p. 58. Marginal notes. Translation of Racine, source et fondement des anabaptistes ou rebaptisez de nostre temps, Book 1. First translation from a European language to be published in America. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

Racine, source et fondement des anabaptistes ou rebaptisez de nostre temps. Book 1. English Brès, Guy de, 1522-1567. Scottow, Joshua, 1618-1698.
[5], 58 p.
Printed, and to be sold by Marmaduke Johnson, Cambridge [Mass.] : 1668.
Advertisement: p. 58. Marginal notes. Translation of Racine, source et fondement des anabaptistes ou rebaptisez de nostre temps, Book 1. First translation from a European language to be published in America. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Marmaduke Johnson
